verses.verse: And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and <S%G4198>departed<s%> from the <S%G2411>temple:<s%> and his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to him for to <S%G1925>show<s%> him the <S%G3619>buildings<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G991>See<s%> you not <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things? <S%G281>truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, There shall not be <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> one <S%G3037>stone<s%> on another, that shall not be <S%G2647>thrown<s%> down. <S%G2647><s%>

And as he <S%G2521>sat<s%> on the <S%G3735>mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives,<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to him <S%G2596>privately,<s%> <S%G2398><s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2036>Tell<s%> us, <S%G4218>when<s%> shall <S%G5023>these<s%> things be? and <S%G5101>what<s%> shall be the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of your <S%G3952>coming,<s%> and of the <S%G4930>end<s%> of the <S%G165>world?<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, Take <S%G991>heed<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G4105>deceive<s%> you.
For <S%G4183>many<s%> shall <S%G2064>come<s%> in my <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> and shall <S%G4105>deceive<s%> many. <S%G4183><s%>

And you shall <S%G191>hear<s%> of <S%G4171>wars<s%> and <S%G189>rumors<s%> of <S%G4171>wars:<s%> <S%G3708>see<s%> that you be not <S%G2360>troubled:<s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> these things <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1096>come<s%> to pass, but the <S%G5056>end<s%> is not yet. <S%G3768><s%>

For <S%G1484>nation<s%> shall <S%G1453>rise<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1484>nation,<s%> and <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G932>kingdom:<s%> and there shall be <S%G3042>famines,<s%> and <S%G3061>pestilences,<s%> and <S%G4578>earthquakes,<s%> in divers places. <S%G5117><s%>
<S%G3956>All<s%> these <S%G5023><s%> are the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of sorrows. <S%G5604><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> shall they <S%G3860>deliver<s%> you up to be <S%G2347>afflicted,<s%> and shall <S%G615>kill<s%> you: and you shall be hated of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> for my <S%G3686>name's<s%> sake.

And <S%G5119>then<s%> shall <S%G4183>many<s%> be <S%G4624>offended,<s%> and shall <S%G3860>betray<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> and shall <S%G3404>hate<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> another. <S%G240><s%>
And <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophets<s%> shall <S%G1453>rise,<s%> and shall <S%G4105>deceive<s%> many. <S%G4183><s%>
And <S%G1223>because<s%> <S%G458>iniquity<s%> shall <S%G4129>abound,<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> shall <S%G5594>wax<s%> cold. <S%G5594><s%>
But he that shall <S%G5278>endure<s%> to the <S%G5056>end,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> shall be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

And <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%G2784>preached<s%> in <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> for a <S%G3142>witness<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations;<s%> and <S%G5119>then<s%> shall the <S%G5056>end<s%> come. <S%G2240><s%>

<S%G3752>When<s%> you <S%G3767>therefore<s%> shall <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G946>abomination<s%> of <S%G2050>desolation,<s%> <S%G4483>spoken<s%> of by <S%G1158>Daniel<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> in the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G3588>(whoever<s%> <S%G314>reads,<s%> let him understand: <S%G3539><s%> )
<S%G5119>Then<s%> let them which be in <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> the mountains: <S%G3735><s%>
Let him which is <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1430>housetop<s%> not <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to <S%G142>take<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing out of his house: <S%G3614><s%>
<S%G3361>Neither<s%> let him which is in the <S%G68>field<s%> <S%G1994>return<s%> <S%G3694>back<s%> to <S%G142>take<s%> his clothes. <S%G2440><s%>
And <S%G3759>woe<s%> to them that are with child, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> <S%G2192><s%> and to them that give <S%G2337>suck<s%> in <S%G1565>those<s%> days! <S%G2250><s%>
But <S%G4336>pray<s%> you that <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5437>flight<s%> be not in the <S%G5494>winter,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day:

For <S%G5119>then<s%> shall be <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation,<s%> <S%G3634>such<s%> as was not <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> to <S%G3568>this<s%> <S%G2540>time,<s%> <S%G3361>no,<s%> nor <S%G3364><s%> <S%G3761><s%> <S%G3364>ever<s%> shall be.

And <S%G1508>except<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> should be <S%G2856>shortened,<s%> there should no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> be <S%G4982>saved:<s%> but for the <S%G1588>elect's<s%> sake <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> shall be shortened. <S%G2856><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man shall <S%G2036>say<s%> to you, <S%G2400>See,<s%> here <S%G5602><s%> is <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5602>there;<s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> it not.

For there shall <S%G1453>arise<s%> false <S%G5580>Christs,<s%> and <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophets,<s%> and shall <S%G1325>show<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> and <S%G5059>wonders;<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that, if <S%G1487><s%> it were <S%G1415>possible,<s%> they shall <S%G4105>deceive<s%> the <S%G2532>very<s%> elect. <S%G1588><s%>
<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I have <S%G4280>told<s%> you before. <S%G4280><s%>

<S%G3767>Why<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> they shall <S%G2036>say<s%> to you, <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> he is in the <S%G2048>desert;<s%> <S%G1831>go<s%> not <S%G1831>forth:<s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> he is in the <S%G5009>secret<s%> <S%G5009>chambers;<s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> it not.

For as the <S%G796>lightning<s%> <S%G1831>comes<s%> out of the <S%G395>east,<s%> and <S%G5316>shines<s%> even to the <S%G1424>west;<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> shall <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> be.
For wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G1437><s%> the <S%G4430>carcass<s%> is, <S%G1563>there<s%> will the <S%G105>eagles<s%> be <S%G4863>gathered<s%> together. <S%G4863><s%>

<S%G2112>Immediately<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> of <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> shall the <S%G2246>sun<s%> be <S%G4654>darkened,<s%> and the <S%G4582>moon<s%> shall not <S%G1325>give<s%> her <S%G5338>light,<s%> and the <S%G792>stars<s%> shall <S%G4098>fall<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and the <S%G1411>powers<s%> of the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> shall be shaken: <S%G4531><s%>

And <S%G5119>then<s%> shall <S%G5316>appear<s%> the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven:<s%> and <S%G5119>then<s%> shall <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5443>tribes<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2875>mourn,<s%> and they shall <S%G3700>see<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> in the <S%G3507>clouds<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> with <S%G1411>power<s%> and <S%G4183>great<s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>

And he shall <S%G649>send<s%> his <S%G32>angels<s%> with a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>sound<s%> of a <S%G4536>trumpet,<s%> and they shall <S%G1996>gather<s%> <S%G1996>together<s%> his <S%G1588>elect<s%> from the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G417>winds,<s%> from one <S%G206>end<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> to the other. <S%G1565><s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> a <S%G3850>parable<s%> of the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree;<s%> <S%G3752>When<s%> his <S%G2798>branch<s%> is <S%G2236>yet<s%> <S%G527>tender,<s%> and <S%G1631>puts<s%> <S%G1631>forth<s%> <S%G5444>leaves,<s%> you <S%G1097>know<s%> that summer <S%G2330><s%> is near: <S%G1451><s%>

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> you, <S%G3752>when<s%> you shall <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, <S%G1097>know<s%> that it is near, <S%G1451><s%> even <S%G1909>at<s%> the doors. <S%G2374><s%>

<S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> shall not <S%G3928>pass,<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things be fulfilled. <S%G1096><s%>
<S%G3772>Heaven<s%> and <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G3928>away,<s%> but my <S%G3056>words<s%> shall not <S%G3928>pass<s%> away. <S%G3928><s%>

But of that <S%G2250>day<s%> and <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762>,<s%> <S%G3761>no,<s%> not the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> but my <S%G3962>Father<s%> only. <S%G3441><s%>
But as the <S%G2250>days<s%> of Noe <S%G3575><s%> were, <S%G3779>so<s%> shall <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> be.

For as in the <S%G2250>days<s%> that were <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2627>flood<s%> they were <S%G5176>eating<s%> and <S%G4095>drinking,<s%> <S%G1060>marrying<s%> and giving in <S%G1547>marriage,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> that <S%G3575>Noe<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the ark, <S%G2787><s%>

And <S%G1097>knew<s%> not <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G2627>flood<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> and <S%G142>took<s%> them <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G142>away;<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> shall <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> be.
<S%G5119>Then<s%> shall <S%G1417>two<s%> be in the <S%G68>field;<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> shall be <S%G3880>taken,<s%> and the <S%G1520>other<s%> left. <S%G863><s%>

Two <S%G1417><s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> shall be <S%G229>grinding<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G3459>mill;<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> shall be <S%G3880>taken,<s%> and the <S%G1520>other<s%> left. <S%G863><s%>
<S%G1127>Watch<s%> <S%G3767>therefore:<s%> for you <S%G1492>know<s%> not <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> does come. <S%G2064><s%>

But <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G1565>this,<s%> that <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G3611>manager<s%> of the <S%G3617>house<s%> had <S%G1492>known<s%> in <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G5438>watch<s%> the <S%G2812>thief<s%> would <S%G2064>come,<s%> he would have <S%G1127>watched,<s%> and would not have <S%G1439>suffered<s%> his <S%G3614>house<s%> to be <S%G1358>broken<s%> up.

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> be you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2092>ready:<s%> for in such an <S%G5610>hour<s%> as you <S%G1380>think<s%> not the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> comes. <S%G2064><s%>

<S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> is a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> and <S%G5429>wise<s%> <S%G1401>servant,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> his <S%G2962>lord<s%> has <S%G2525>made<s%> <S%G2525>ruler<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> his <S%G2322>household,<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> them <S%G5160>meat<s%> in due season? <S%G2540><s%>
Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is that <S%G1401>servant,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> his <S%G2962>lord<s%> when he <S%G2064>comes<s%> shall <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> doing. <S%G4160><s%>
<S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, That he shall <S%G2525>make<s%> him <S%G2525>ruler<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> his goods. <S%G5224><s%>
But and <S%G1437>if<s%> that <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%> shall <S%G2036>say<s%> in his <S%G2588>heart,<s%> My <S%G2962>lord<s%> <S%G5549>delays<s%> his coming; <S%G2064><s%>
And shall <S%G756>begin<s%> to smite <S%G5180><s%> his fellow <S%G4889>servants,<s%> and to <S%G2068>eat<s%> and <S%G4095>drink<s%> with the drunken; <S%G3184><s%>

The <S%G2962>lord<s%> of that <S%G1401>servant<s%> shall <S%G2240>come<s%> in a <S%G2250>day<s%> when he <S%G4328>looks<s%> not for him, and in an <S%G5610>hour<s%> that he is not <S%G1097>aware<s%> of,

And shall <S%G1371>cut<s%> him <S%G1371>asunder,<s%> and appoint <S%G5087><s%> him his <S%G3313>portion<s%> with the <S%G5273>hypocrites:<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> shall be <S%G2805>weeping<s%> and <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>
